mapper.select: select p.*, true as saved, case when l.liked is null then 0 when l.liked then 1 else -1 end as liked from forum.post p inner join forum.saved_post s on p.id = s.post_id and s.uid = #{uid} left join forum.liked_post l on l.post_id = p.id and l.uid = #{uid} where p.status = 0 order by s.id desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}

with recursive subposts as (select * from forum.post where id = #{startId} and status = 0 union select p.* from forum.post p inner join subposts s on s.parent_id = p.id where p.status = 0) select p.*, case when l.liked is null then 0 when l.liked then 1 else -1 end as liked, case when s.id is null then false else true end as saved from subposts p left join forum.saved_post s on s.post_id = p.id and s.uid = #{uid} left join forum.liked_post l on l.post_id = p.id and l.uid = #{uid} order by ${orderStr} limit #{limit}

with lvlOnePosts as (select * from forum.post where thread_id = #{threadId} and parent_id < 1 and status = 0 order by pinned desc, ${ordering} limit #{count} offset #{offset}) select allpost.*, case when l.liked is null then 0 when l.liked then 1 else -1 end as liked, case when s.id is null then false else true end as saved from (select * from lvlOnePosts union all (select lvlTwoPosts.* from lvlOnePosts p1 join lateral ( select * from forum.post p where p.parent_id = p1.id and p.status = 0 order by p.id desc limit 3 ) lvlTwoPosts on true)) allpost left join forum.saved_post s on s.post_id = allpost.id and s.uid = #{uid} left join forum.liked_post l on l.post_id = allpost.id and l.uid = #{uid}
